titleStmt.title: A Fragmentary Column of Hesiod's Catalogue

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: l.2 >> remove [.?] at beginning of line 2 and ll. 7-30; Πύλον ε ἶ(^)χε καὶ ἔ(´)κτισε; remove [.?] at end of l. 3-30; add *hyphen* after theta in l. 7; scribal circumflex (not acute) in l. 10 and no final sigma in epithet; respace παντοῖ’ in l. 11; ἀ(`)γλαὰ in l. 13; παντοῖ’ at start of l. 15; use |subst| in l. 15; πολ έ(´)α_[ς and ἀπ]_ ό(´)λεσσε in l. 16; εἷλ’ at start of l. 21; regularize ὅλλυντο in l. 21; I would say middot at end of 21; β ί(´)ης in l. 22; ἑζόμενος in l. 23; use |subst| in l. 23; ταλασίφρονα in l. 25; dot the first alpha of l. 29; use |subst| in l. 29; παλ ά(´)μηισ[ι] in l. 29; use final sigma at end of l. 33. META: remove volume number from biblio 6265; image link is (http://163.1.169.40/gsdl/collect/POxy/index/assoc/HASH0174/2eed8b27.dir/POxy.v0028.n2486.a.01.hires.jpg); Hesiod is CWKB 917; mp3 is 00517.400; Oxyrhynchus is Pleiades (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/736983);

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - TEXT: l.2 >> remove [.?] at beginning of line 2 and ll. 7-30; Πύλον ε ἶ(^)χε καὶ ἔ(´)κτισε; remove [.?] at end of l. 3-30; add *hyphen* after theta in l. 7; scribal circumflex (not acute) in l. 10 and no final sigma in epithet; respace παντοῖ’ in l. 11; ἀ(`)γλαὰ in l. 13; παντοῖ’ at start of l. 15; use |subst| in l. 15; πολ έ(´)α_[ς and ἀπ]_ ό(´)λεσσε in l. 16; εἷλ’ at start of l. 21; regularize ὅλλυντο in l. 21; I would say middot at end of 21; β ί(´)ης in l. 22; ἑζόμενος in l. 23; use |subst| in l. 23; ταλασίφρονα in l. 25; dot the first alpha of l. 29; use |subst| in l. 29; παλ ά(´)μηισ[ι] in l. 29; use final sigma at end of l. 33.
